abstract: St Louis Cardinals manager Tony La Russa, who is busy preparing his team for Game 3 of National League division series against Philadelphia Phillies, has developed a reputation for subtle calculation and bold action over the years; La Russa's current contract expires at end of year, but wherever he ends up, he is likely to make an impact.
snippet: Over 33 seasons with three different clubs, the Cardinals’ Tony La Russa has developed a reputation for subtle calculation and bold action.
lead_paragraph: Over 33 seasons with three different clubs, the Cardinals’ Tony La Russa has developed a reputation for subtle calculation and bold action.

headline.main: Postseason Pressure a Pleasure to La Russa
headline.print_headline: For the Always-Thinking La Russa, Pressure in the Postseason Is a Pleasure
headline.seo: Postseason Pressure a Pleasure to La Russa
